post:
Ready2Frag - One-Stop Shop for all your hosting needs! We offer Game Servers, KVM VPSs, Dedicated Servers, Web Hosting, and even Colocation.

We operate purely on company-owned and colocated hardware within our suite in the Steadfast Networks 725 S. Wells facility in downtown Chicago, IL.

We currently have plans to expand to a facility in downtown New York around December of this year or January of next. Prices and quality of service will remain the same.


=======================

Included Features

=======================

High Performance VPS Hosting

  • Intel Xeon E3 Processors
  • Samsung SSDs in Hardware RAID-10
  • 1Gbps Network Port
  • KVM Virtualization
Full Control

  • SolusVM Control Panel
  • Full Root & SFTP Access
  • Many KVM OS Templates
Instant Setup


=======================

Facility & Network

=======================

Enterprise Facility

  • Steadfast Networks - 725 S. Wells - Chicago, IL
  • Redundancy at all levels (Power / Cooling / Network)
  • 24/7/365 Security & NOC Staffing
Premium Network

  • Steadfast Blend (http://bgp.he.net/AS32748)
  • Level(3), NTT, GTT, TATA, Cogent, HE.net
  • 10Gbit Peering to the Equinix Exchange



=======================
